title: Augmented Reality-Based Vertical Discourse Design: Paradigm Shift in Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical theory and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Mathematics curriculum for enhancing managerial decision-making competencies. Augmented reality-based learning environment with real-world business scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can abstract real-world problems and convert them into structured knowledge through mathematical modeling in augmented reality environments.
Learners can critically analyze the ideological characteristics of technological tools using vertical discourse techniques.
Learners can develop educational strategies that consider social classification systems and control mechanisms when designing projects incorporating augmented reality.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
